Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: Hi ! I was told that you were new in the middle. I will help you a little to take in hand your new toy. They call me the Seabed's Playboy. But you can call me George too.

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: Look a little around you (move the mouse). You can lean to see better (zoom with the wheel).

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: Great. Starts by turning on [color=lime]spots[/color]. You have two buttons on your left. One for the [color=teal]short range spots[/color], the other for [color=red]long range spots[/color].

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: What are you waiting for? Turn on them!

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: Good start, you should see more clearly. In front of you you have a [color=lime] sleeve [/color], that's what you run the sub. (w/z, a/q, s, d). \ n Give it a try to see.

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: On the right of the handle, you have a [color=lime]big throttle[/color]. It's to put ... the gases. Try a little, but go slowly to start!

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: Sur le côté droit t'as les sonars. Jettes-y un coup d'oeil de temps en temps, tu verras les choses arriver avant qu'elles percutent ton sub ! Oublies pas de les allumer.

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: On the left side up we put you a radio, not that you're bored. Have you ever listened [color=lime]Ocean Radio[/color] ? The best sound of the seabed!

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: Oh, last thing. If you ever hear an alarm, you can not miss it, press the [color=red]Alarm[/color] button on the left panel. It will probably be because you hit something.

Nodes.name: George
Nodes.text: Well, I have a blonde who is waiting for me. Good exploration!
